alertAccountNotInstalled.title: PrestaShop Accounts module needed
alertAccountNotInstalled.message: To enable this module you need to install the PrestaShop Accounts module on your shop

alertAccountNotEnabled.title: PrestaShop Accounts module needed
alertAccountNotEnabled.message: To enable this module you need to activate the PrestaShop Accounts module on your shop

multiShopSelector.title: Multi-store mode activated
multiShopSelector.subtitle: You must configure your stores one by one for this service, but your will be able to use the same account
multiShopSelector.selectStore: Please select the first store to configure from the list below
multiShopSelector.tips: After you are done with the first shop, you can configure the others, by selecting them one by one in the shop selector, in the horizontal menu

account.title: Votre compte PrestaShop
account.authorize: Authorize your account to manage your shop's services
account.authorized: You authorize this account to manage shop's services
account.emailConfirmationAlert: A confirmation email has been sent. Check your inbox and click on the link to activate your account
account.needToBeAdmin: In order to proceed, you have to be administrator of the shop
